# deckgo-excalidraw



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                      | Type              | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------- | ----------- |
| `scene`  | --        | An Excalidraw scene that contains app state and elements. On change, Excalidraw will be updated. | `ExcalidrawScene` | `undefined` |


## Methods

### `exportScene() => Promise<Blob | null>`

Export Excalidraw scene data to blob

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<Blob>`



### `toBlob(type?: string) => Promise<Blob>`

Export Excalidraw scene to blob - i.e. to image

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<Blob>`
